Grading:

1\. Each person should be responsible for summarizing class readings (plus class discussion). 50%

2.     A final research paper for any topic in vocabulary learning or teaching- 40% (about 8-10 pages) (research topic-due: midterm)

3.  Classroom participation/discussion and sharing ideas: Web messages forum participation and sharing information. 10%
